name: Unleashed Software Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Unleashed Software Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Unleashed Software API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Unleashed Software API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: salesOrder

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get a stock on hand
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many stocks on hand

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: asAtDate (值: None) - Returns the stock on hand for a specific date
IsAssembled (值: None) - Whether the AvailableQty will also include the quantity that can be assembled
modifiedSince (值: None) - Returns stock on hand values modified after a specific date
orderBy (值: None) - Orders the list by a specific column, by default the list is ordered by productCode
productId (值: None) - Returns products with the specific Product Guid. You can enter multiple product IDs separated by commas.
warehouseCode (值: None) - Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse code
warehouseName (值: None) - Returns stock on hand for a specific warehouse name
